title: Just wondering if the 0/31 Lee Sin on my team ever got punished....
body:
Aren't you supposed to get a little message when a player is punished and you helped by reporting him? (On my other account btw)

This fuckin guy was afk for the first 5-10 minutes of the game and when he came back he repeatedly ran down mid/bot/top and died. 
Riot, don't you think when a player goes 0/15/0 or around there they should just be perma banned on the spot?

(On my other account btw)

replies.body:
On another note, my understanding is that only the last person to report them (and cause a punishment) gets any notice.

e.g. if 10 players report someone and the 10th report causes a punishment, player 10 will get a notice about it, players 1-9 will not.

If a player goes 0/15/0, they are either
1. Bad at the game
2. Feeding intentionally
3. Getting focused down

And perma banning someone innocent is really uncalled for.
There is absolutely no reason at all to have 0 assists or kills. If a player really is that bad, then it's probably a Bots game.

No...
I've had a game where I was 1/12/3 as Twitch.
I got flamed really hard- when in reality I was camped and countered. (Not to mention my bard "support" left me whenever they pushed turret)
I've had a few worse games, but I forget those right now.
I do agree intentional feeders should be banned, but those who are really unlucky, who are put on tilt, who are camped, those people should not be banned.

Do you not understand that 1/12/3 is not the same thing as 0/15/0. You had assists and a kill that game. There is no way in hell anyone can die 15 times without getting a kill or assist. There needs to be a system where it stops intent feeders like my Lee Sin instantly.

They're working on that.
You think Rome was built in a day? They have to fine tune this bloody system with every variable.
Not to mention I was the ADC that game- I was almost always with someone (usually our jungler, because fuck bard "support")
They may not be the same, but they are similar.

I think the notifications are only for chat related punishments at present. 
0/15/0 is not necessarily unheard of. Sometimes you get countered in every lane, but the enemy doesn't know how to close the game. It happens.
